term.title: calibration interval

item.text: Time period between calibrations over which the performance of the measuring system may be expected to meet specified requirements.

notes.item: Guidelines for the determination of calibration intervals of measuring systems are given in ILAC-G24.
ISO 14532 refers to a period "between routine calibrations".

sources.item: PAC, 2021, 93, 997. 'Metrological and quality concepts in analytical chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 2021)' on page 1003 (https://doi.org/10.1515/pac-2019-0819)
